channel.title: ::noclip help
channel.description: I need the command ::noclip How do i add it to server BTW I NEED PROJECT INSANITY COMMAND

item.title: ::noclip help
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

Well most ppl find it hard to fix noclip on there PI server but its quite easy all u have to do is the following.

Client.java ( Client Side ) and search for :

"::"
WITH BOTH "".

and u will find something like that above it:

if(inputString.startsWith("/"))

between them add this :

if(inputString.equals("::noclip")) { for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++) { for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++) { for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++) aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0; 
							}
						}
					}
				}</blockquote>

If you already have it and its not working u might have something like that :

/*if(inputString.equals("::noclip")) { for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++) { for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++) { for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++) aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0; 
							}
						}
					}*/
				}</blockquote>

If u do just delete both the /* and */ or sometimes its //.

Hope This Works, but i think it will since i have tryed it on my PI server already.

Read full topic
